title: and for the purpose of giving effect to Regulation (EC) No. 1008/2008 of the
heading: 2. The European Communities (Common Rules for the Operation of Air
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Common Rules for the Operation of Air 
Services in the Community) Regulations 2008 (S.I.No.426 of 2008) are 
amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 6 – 

(i) 

(ii) 

in paragraph (1), by the substitution of “Commission” for 
“Minister”, 

in paragraph (2), by the substitution of “Commission” for 
“Minister”, 

(b) 

in Regulation 7, by the substitution of “Commission” for 
“Minister”. 

GIVEN under my official seal, 

26 March, 2021. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

1 OJ No. L293,31.10.2008, p.3 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th April, 2021.

title: and for the purpose of giving effect to Regulation (EC) No. 1008/2008 of the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the European Communities (Common Rules for the 
Operation of Air Services in the Community) Regulations 2008 (SI No. 426 of 
2008). The purpose of these Regulations is to give further effect to the 
implementation of Regulation (EC) No. 1008/2008 on common rules for the 
operation of air services in the Community, in so far as to transfer the power to 
enforce Article 23 of Regulation (EC) No. 1008/2008 from the Minister for 
Transport to the Commission for Aviation Regulation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [165]
